[MY PREVIOUS ACTION - Turn 193]
Reasoning: **Ante 8: Shop Analysis**

Okay, so we're in Round 17, and the goal is Ante 8. The game phase is currently the shop, and I've got $45 to work with. My hand level is already a solid High Card Lvl 7, giving me a good base of 65 chips and 7 mult. This run is all about that *sweet* Stuntman Holo, which boosts chips by a hefty 250 and mult by 10, but it does cost me two hand size. With Pareidolia, every card is a face card. Currently running Smiley Face (+5 mult for face cards), Photograph (X2 mult for the first played face card), Hanging Chad (Retrigger the first played card twice more), and Stuntman (Holo). I'm also holding The World consumable, which could be handy for converting cards later. I also have some Vouchers in my back pocket. I also happen to have a -2 hand size.

This Droll Joker is useless for my High Card build, so it's not useful. Merry Andy is similarly useless/harmful.

Looking at the core calculation, my effective base is 315 chips (65 + 250) and 17 mult (7 + 10). Here's how the scoring works. Because of Stuntman, Smiley Face, Photograph, and Hanging Chad, I expect a colossal score for a single high card.

My base mult of 17 gets a boost from Smiley Face (+5) and then is doubled by Photograph. Then, Hanging Chad retriggers this process twice. The math: Starting mult is 17.  First card played gets: 17 + 5 = 22, and then 22 * 2 = 44. Next trigger: 44 + 5 = 49, and 49 * 2 = 98. Final trigger: 98 + 5 = 103, and then 103 * 2 = 206. Total is 315 * 206 = 64,890. I have to make sure to get the order right: Base mult of 17, then Smiley's addition, then the doubling from Photograph.

$45 is a good chunk of change, but I can improve on what's available here. I have a lot of good stuff to build on, but I am hoping to get even better. Right now, the shop cards aren't anything special. The reroll cost is $8.

What I'm *really* looking for: Pluto cards (I do have Telescope), Blue Seals, Red Seals, Steel Cards (for Tarots), or maybe a better xMult Joker to replace Smiley Face. Though honestly, Smiley Face is pretty damn strong here because the addition happens before Photograph's doubling.

If I replaced Smiley Face with something like The Duo (X2 on Pair), it's not going to do me much good. Even a good scaling joker would be better to evaluate. Considering how the mult is stacked, Smiley Face is contributing roughly 7/8ths of the final mult calculation. Let's see...17 becomes 22, then 44, then 49, then 98, and finally 103 and 206. # Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

reasoning:
**Final Push: Shop Decisions in Ante 8**

Alright, this is it, the final stretch. I'm at Ante 8, Round 17. Let's see, $48 in the bank, and my strategy is crystal clear: high card, leveraging Pareidolia to make every card a face card, and then maximizing xMult with Photograph and Hanging Chad on a single card.

My current arsenal consists of: Smiley Face (+5 Mult for face cards), Photograph (X2 Mult for first face card played), Hanging Chad (Retrigger the first card twice), Stuntman (Holo) (+250 Chips, +10 Mult, -2 hand size), and Pareidolia (All cards are face cards). I also have "The World" which will be useful for spades. My hand level is at level 7 for high card and it's base stats are 65 chips and 7 mult.

The shop offerings are... not great. Green Joker (+1 Mult per hand, -1 per discard) is too late to be useful. The Idol (X2 Mult for King of Diamonds) is tempting, but the suit restriction is too risky when I'm relying on Pareidolia. Wily Joker (+100 Chips for 3 of a Kind) is irrelevant since I'm running High Card. And then there's Blue Joker (Foil) which grants +2 Chips per card in deck + 50 Foil chips, that would be 158 chips for me right now.

I'm getting around 66,950 chips per hand right now. This is a bit low, but I will need two to four hands to beat the Boss Blind.

So, the big question is, should I reroll? I have $48, and a reroll costs $10.

Let's do some math: Replacing Smiley Face with the Blue Joker would be a loss of about 22,750 chips. It's safe to say Smiley Face is better.

What about Pareidolia? I don't think I can safely ditch Pareidolia. Face card draws aren't guaranteed, and that would leave my combo dead in the water. So Pareidolia is also safe.

No to the Green Joker. No to The Idol. No to Wily Joker.

I *do* have Telescope which guarantees Pluto cards in Celestial Packs. And I'd love some Tarot Packs for Steel or Red Seal cards. But there are no packs, so that's not possible.

So, I'm going to take a reroll, hoping for better Jokers, flat X-mult, or a card that amps up chip generation. Reroll!
